name: Interlock
overview: A secure banking platform allowing users to link accounts and transfer funds seamlessly.
challenge: Building a secure, reliable financial application that integrates with real-world banking APIs while maintaining a simple, user-friendly interface.
solution: Implemented a robust architecture using Plaid for banking data and Dwolla for payment processing. Secured personal data with AES-256 encryption.
your_role: Designed and developed the entire application, including the secure authentication flow and real-time transaction processing.

results.impact: Demonstrated capability in building secure, high-stakes financial applications.
learnings: Integration of complex third-party financial APIs
Advanced security patterns for sensitive data

name: AltShift
overview: A Google Docs alternative with real-time collaboration and AI-powered editing features.
challenge: Enabling multiple users to edit a document simultaneously without conflicts, while integrating AI assistance naturally into the workflow.
solution: Used Liveblocks for real-time websocket connections and Groq for fast AI inference counters to generate text and translate content.
your_role: Full-stack implementation of the real-time engine and AI integration.

results.impact: Created a seamless collaborative writing environment.

name: XDevVerse
overview: A comprehensive platform for organizing and managing hackathons, from registration to judging.
challenge: Managing complex event lifecycles, team formations, and project submissions in one unified platform.
solution: Built a scalable schema to handle events, teams, and judging criteria. Added real-time leaderboards and automated notifications.
your_role: Architected the database schema and built the full user flow for organizers and participants.

results.impact: Simplifies the logistics of running large-scale coding events.
